summary: The implementation appears to cover most requirements with homepage sections, routing, city pages, and design elements. However, several specific requirements lack clear evidence in the provided diff, particularly around exact text content, image implementations, and contact form details. Some city pages are truncated making full verification impossible.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero section must display exact headline 'Sprinkler & Irrigation Services in Northern New Jersey'
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a headline in HeroSection.tsx but the exact text match cannot be verified due to potential truncation or formatting differences

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer must include a simple contact form for estimate requests with fields for name, phone, email, and message
missing_requirements.reason: Footer.tsx is truncated at the contact form section, making it impossible to verify if all required fields (name, phone, email, message) are present

hallucinated_features.description: Business hours information added to Contact page
hallucinated_features.reason: Contact page includes business hours with specific times (Monday-Saturday 7:00 AM - 6:00 PM) which was not requested in any requirement

hallucinated_features.description: Service type field in contact form
hallucinated_features.reason: Contact.tsx form includes a 'serviceType' field in formData state that was not specified in REQ-8 requirements which only mentions name, phone, email, and message
